channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: U.S. Legislators Reaffirm Ties With Taiwan on Anniversary of Relations Act
item.description: U.S. House Representatives and co-chairs of the Congressional Taiwan Caucus introduced a resolution reaffirming the United States’ commitment to Taiwan and commemorating the 45th a

item.title: Taiwan’s Exports up Almost 19% in March as Tech Sector Booms
item.description: Taiwan’s exports are up over last year, led in large part by demand for technologies such as AI.

item.title: New Zealand To Allow Import of Taiwanese Pineapples
item.description: New Zealand will soon start buying Taiwanese pineapples after nearly eight years of bilateral negotiations. The new agreement will only allow pineapples grown under certain conditi

item.title: Taiwan Indigenous Amis Singer Putad Pihay Deported After Entering U.S. Without V
item.description: Indigenous Amis singer Putad Pihay of the band Outlet Drift has been deported back to Taiwan after lying to U.S. customs agents about her visa. She says the organizer of the event
